name: Ashlee Craft
profile:
I'm an author, musician, artist, actress, filmmaker, photographer, and poet. 
 
I play guitar, piano, and harmonica; sing; and write my own music and lyrics. The Strength of Hope is my first single and I plan on releasing my debut album in the near future.

I have published two fiction books, both of which are available for purchase through Amazon, in both print and Kindle formats. I have also published eight books of poetry and an illustrated children's book, all of which are available on Amazon as well. Currently, I am writing several other novels and poetry books.

I am also an avid filmmaker and screenwriter, and am currently working on writing a screenplay, which I will act in, produce, and direct. I enjoy painting, drawing, and photography as well, and I am now selling prints of these on DeviantArt & Zazzle.
